name: Scrambled D.A.W
description:
You play as an error, trying to complete platformer levels with the  WASD keyboard inputs scrambled about to make traversing mentally difficult.

There are 10 short levels, each harder than the last.

Sounds are not my own, but from freesound.com and augmented using audacity.

Download

Unfortunately the game is only downloadable for windows at the moment 

How I allocated my time

The core mechanic of switching keys took about 40 minutes to implement. After that I spent about 30 minutes on level design, another half hour on the art, probably about 20 minutes on the tutorial, intro and end - leaving me trying to get some sounds in the last half hour.

Instagram: @oliver_spicer
